description: Non-material Amendment to planning permission ref. 10105/APP/2021/235, dated 13-04-2021 (Section 96a (Non-Material Amendment) application seeking amendments to Condition 2 (Approved Plans) of ref: 10105/APP/2018/181 (06-04-2018) for the installation of replacement lattice stub tower supporting headframe supporting 9No.antennas and transmission dish and ancillary apparatus, removal of 2No. pole mounted antennas all on rooftop of building, and installation of ground based equipment cabinets (removal of existing redundant cabinet) and ancillary apparatus; namely to change the approved stub tower and support poles, existing and new antenna are to be located and relocated onto the new stub tower, and ground based equipment and cabinets is to be reduced in number.) to change approved Stub tower and support poles with stub mast and tripod / quadpod mounts on the rooftop are to be utilised for the installation of the new antenna. Installation of 2 x new CSC cabinets and installation of 1 x GPS module on the stub mast.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on the submitted plans, numbers 164967-00-004-ML003 Rev.3, 164967-22-100-MD027 Rev. 27, 164967-22-101-MD027 Rev. 27, 164967-22-150-MD027 Rev. 27 and 164967-22-151-MD027 Rev. 27 and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions Hillingdon Local Plan Parts 1 (November 2012) and 2 (January 2020) and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than condition 2, which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref: 10105/APP/2018/181 (06-04-18) must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
